title: Directors and officers
context: ยง415A-14 Directors and officers. Not less than one-half of the directors of a professional corporation and all of the officers, other than the secretary and the treasurer, shall be qualified persons with respect to the corporation. At least one director shall be a resident of this State. [L 1985, c 259, pt of ยง1; am L 1987, c 135, ยง119]
